topic.title: Functional Status Result Organizer - conformance rules

section.p: This clinical statement identifies a set of functional status result observations. It contains information applicable to all of the contained functional status result observations. A functional status organizer may group self-care observations related to a patient's ability to feed, bathe, and dress. An appropriate nullFlavor can be used when the organizer/code or organizer/id is unknown.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14361, CONF:14362 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.66"
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14355, R2.0=1098-14355)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14357, R2.0=1098-14357)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14363, R2.0=CONF:1098-14363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14358)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:14359, CONF:14368)
Conforms to Functional Status Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14747, CONF:14748)
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14355, R2.0=1098-14355)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14357, R2.0=1098-14357)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14363, R2.0=CONF:1098-14363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14358)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:14359, CONF:14368)
Conforms to Functional Status Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67)

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results SHOULD also be allowed. (CONF:7164)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" Cluster (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) OR SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="BATTERY" Battery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7165)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14747, CONF:14748)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.66"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1208056192"/> <code code="248434069"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <component> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1051417473"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author/> <entryRelationship> <supply classCode="SPLY"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="935840875"/> <code code="1053631629"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </supply> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="222694656"/> <code code="405250749"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <participant typeCode="IND"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1153959107"/> <code code="924304720"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.86"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </component> </organizer>
